scan_table_check.description: An ATF test that is part of an application should be in at least one ATF test suite that is also part of the same application. A test may also be part of ATF test suites defined in other applications. Note that the records that link a test to a suite (sys_atf_test_suite_test) must also be in the same application.
scan_table_check.name: CodeSanity - ATF test must be in an ATF suite
scan_table_check.resolution_details: Add the ATF test to an ATF test suite defined in the same application.
scan_table_check.short_description: Each ATF test contained in an application must be in at least one ATF suite.
scan_table_check.sys_name: CodeSanity - ATF test must be in an ATF suite
